Results

Bandai Namco is one of the top 10 gaming publishers in the world.

Creating some of the most well-recognized games and characters in entertainment history, they have defined success in a constantly shifting industry. ANML worked with Bandai Namco to transform their company from a top gaming entity into an entertainment powerhouse. Rethinking their web experience from the ground up, we enhanced interactions, modernized their look and feel, and boosted their online presence to make product launches bigger and better than ever before.

FROM OUR PARTNERS

”Inspiration, originality and a fresh perspective is why most businesses seek out agency support—ideas are the easiest things to source. But what’s more challenging to find in an agency partner is the strategy and execution of a good idea or creative concept. ANML can do both. And in my experience, that’s rare and exciting.”

Ryan Grissom, Director of Digital
Bandai Namco
